name: Hentai Legends
description:
Plunge into weird world where erstwhile coexisting peacefully people of Orcus and Elfs were been involved in hot war. The lead character decides to find cruel leader of the enemy kingdom on his own and cook her goose. On the way to her monastery the
hero is waited by fights based on famously game
"Three in a row" with amazing Elfs who are ready to protect their queen at all hazards. Whether the fighter is able to smite the leader and to stop the longstanding war - the pressure is on, it depends on you only.

Peculiarities of a game:
- The game is based on mechanics "three in a row".
- You are waited by the most beautiful landscapes and fine teachers.
- A set of skills for improvement of the hero's abilities.
- The victory stands upon on well-formed tactics.
